name: Deer Drive
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

FAST PACED ACTION HUNTING

Hunting season is open - BIG TIME. Lock, load, and take down the best trophy bucks. But be careful or dangerous animals like grizzly and moose will be the ones taking you down.
  • No endless tracking! Just hours of shooting fun for one or two players.
  • Stalk your prey and avoid dangerous animals in mountains, forests and open plains.
  • 30+ stages and tons of power-ups to win and use like weapons, scopes, and ammo.
  • Shoot deer, bear, moose, impala, boar, ducks, and many more.
